Package il.ac.hit.Model

Class Calculations

java.lang.Object
il.ac.hit.Model.Calculations
All Implemented Interfaces:
ICalcGPA
public class Calculations
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICalcGPA
This class holds the methods which will be used to do the basic calculations such as calculate final grades and GPA, implements the ICalcGPA interface
See Also:
ICalcGPA

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    Calculations()
    constructor for the Calculations class instantiates the dbActions object from type IDBSimpleActions to new Model object for its calculation purposes

  • Constructor Details

    • Calculations

      public Calculations()

  • Method Details

    • calculate_Final_Grade

      public java.lang.Integer calculate_Final_Grade​(java.lang.Double testGrade, java.lang.Double testPercent, java.lang.Double hwGrade, java.lang.Double hwPercent)
      calculates and returns the final grade of a course. func receives params from the add grade panel by the user

      the calculation of a final grade of every course is based on the scores of its final test and the hw/mid-test . each score mentioned has its own affect on the final grade based on its percentage. the calculation of a final grade is the sum of every score multiplied by its percentage and divided by 100

      Parameters:
      testGrade - final test score
      testPercent - final test percentage
      hwGrade - hw/mid-test score
      hwPercent - hw/mid-test percentage
      Returns:
      final grade Integer value

    • calculate_GPA

      public java.lang.Double calculate_GPA() throws DBActionsException
      Calculates and returns the GPA of the grades table. The func receives params from the add grade panel by the user

      func gets the details list of the table via the getGradeTable method. it calculates the sum of all the final grades multiplied by their specific credits value than the sum is divided by the sum of the credits in total(hence the credit_sum param)

      Specified by:
      calculate_GPA in interface ICalcGPA
      Returns:
      calculated total grade GPA Double type
      Throws:
      DBActionsException - in case of an sql error
      See Also:
      uses this method to retrieve the values of all the courses in order to calculate the gpa, CourseDetails, List

    • gpaByGrade

      public java.lang.Double gpaByGrade​(java.lang.String courseName, java.lang.Integer newGrade) throws DBActionsException
      calculates and returns updated gpa after changing a specific grade. func receives name of the course which its final grade will be changed and the new grade courseName needs to be correct name of the course and grade between 0-100(this is final grade already) this func gives the user the opportunity to check how his gpa will change by entering a different grade

      func gets the details list of the table via the getGradeTable method. func get details of the specific course it needs to change via the getCourse method it calculates the sum of all the final grades multiplied by their specific credits value it subtracts the present course grade multiplied by its credits and than adds the new course grade multiplied by the same credits than the sum is divided by the sum of the credits in total(hence the credit_sum param)

      Specified by:
      gpaByGrade in interface ICalcGPA
      Parameters:
      courseName - correct name of the course that its grade would be replaced
      newGrade - new grade entered by the user to replace the precent grade in the calculation
      Returns:
      calculated total grade gpa
      Throws:
      DBActionsException - in case of an sql error
      See Also:
      uses this method to retrieve the details of the course we want to change, uses this method to retrieve the values of all the courses in order to calculate the gpa, CourseDetails
